title: mri_compute_seg_overlap
description: Compute coefficients of overlap between segmentation volumes.

log_file.title: Log File
log_file.description: Log file for individual Dice coefficients for 12 structure pairs, plus mean, std, and 'overall'.

overall_log_flag.title: Overall Log Flag
overall_log_flag.description: Log file for 'overall' Dice (mean excluding wm, gm, and accumbens).

exclude_cortex_flag.title: Exclude Cortex Flag
exclude_cortex_flag.description: Exclude cerebral cortex labels from all calculation. (0/1 flag, if nonzero)

exclude_wm_flag.title: Exclude White Matter Flag
exclude_wm_flag.description: Exclude cerebral white matter labels from all calculation. (0/1 flag, if nonzero)

all_labels_flag.title: All Labels Flag
all_labels_flag.description: Check all labels, not just the predefined main structures.

dice_params.title: Dice Params
dice_params.description: Standalone way to compute Dice coefficients, using seg1, seg2, ctab, ReportEmpty01, ExcludeId, datfile, and tablefile as additional parameters.
